RustyMagazine.NAME: Rusty Magazine
RustyMagazine.FLAVOR: Rusty magazine for your Rusty Handgun.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you eneter a combat, #yUpgrade ALL #yRusty #yHandguns in your deck.

RumBottle.NAME: Rum Bottle
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain #b1 #yConcentrated and lose #b8 #yPrecision.

ScaleOfInjustice.NAME: Scales Of Injustice
ScaleOfInjustice.FLAVOR: As if world wasn't unfair enough.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain 1 energy. At the end of each turn, deal #b6 damage to the creature with lowest #yHP. (Including you)

TrustyMagazine.NAME: Trusty Magazine
TrustyMagazine.FLAVOR: Trusty magazine for your Trusty Handgun.
